plot: When a widowed mother and her teenage daughter inherit a hot dog stand, they are introduced to a charismatic businessman and are each forever changed in this quirky romantic comedy with a spiritual message.
title: Hot Dog Stand
plot_es: When a widowed mother and her teenage daughter inherit a hot dog stand, they are introduced to a charismatic businessman and are each forever changed in this quirky romantic comedy with a spiritual message.
plot_en: When a widowed mother and her teenage daughter inherit a hot dog stand, they are introduced to a charismatic businessman and are each forever changed in this quirky romantic comedy with a spiritual message.
